external_games.name: Invasion of the Mutant Space Bats of Doom
Invasion of the Mutant Space Bats of Doom

name: Invasion of the Mutant Space Bats of Doom
summary: This game is based on classic Atari shoot-'em-up Demon Attack. This is a sequel of Mutant Space Bats of Doom and have 66 stages, arrenged in some sort of pattern and includes extra items what increase your power fire. The enemies are fly space mutant demons who attack your ship in a coordinated movement.
